Title: Daksh Dave | Personal Webpage
Name: Daksh Dave
Description: Undergraduate at BITS Pilani. An Entrepreneur by the heart and a developer by the mind. My main strengths lie in the vast pieces of knowledge that I have garnered by working across various sectors in Core Electrical, IT, Project Management, Management Consulting, Finance, and Hardware and using those to ideate with diverse people to deluge beyond the prevalent and delineate approaches besetting our interactions to leave an abstruse mark upon the society.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create and workout..!
AboutContent: I’m an Electrical Electronics major by day, a Cross-Fit Enthusisast by evening, a functional wantrepreneur by midnight and a hustler always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m , off to a hike, Working out, or Studying for an exam
I am passionate about Deep Technology and Human Psychology (though, never studied them formally). A die-hard fan of Elon Musk.
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to travel and work together whenever I can.
WorkContent: I am currently a 3rd year Undergrad open to work opportunities

CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
